content.html: Just months ago, systematically deporting people to a country they have no connection to was a far-right fantasy. Now both candidates for PM are promising to not only keep the Rwanda policy, but expand it. This racist scheme is being normalised - we must fight to scrap it.
content.value:
Just months ago, systematically deporting people to a country they have no connection to was a far-right fantasy.

Now both candidates for PM are promising to not only keep the Rwanda policy, but expand it.

This racist scheme is being normalised - we must fight to scrap it.

photo.alt: A screenshot of an article headline that says "Rishi Sunak and Liz Truss promise big expansion of Rwanda asylum scheme".
